member.name: P:WinCopies.GUI.Controls.PlaceholderProperties.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text contents of the text box.
member.value: A containing the text contents of the text box. The default is an empty string ("").

member.name: P:WinCopies.GUI.Controls.PlaceholderProperties.AcceptsReturn
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the text editing control responds when the user presses the ENTER key.
member.value: if pressing the ENTER key inserts a new line at the current cursor position; otherwise, the ENTER key is ignored. The default value is for TextBox and true for RichTextBox.
member.remarks: The ENTER key corresponds to VK_RETURN virtual-key code.

member.name: P:WinCopies.GUI.Controls.PlaceholderProperties.AcceptsTab
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates how the text editing control responds when the user presses the TAB key.
member.value:
if pressing the TAB key inserts a tab character at the current cursor position; if pressing the TAB key moves the focus to the next control that is marked as a tab stop and does not insert a tab character.
The default value is .
